author: Ryan Gaydos
title: NFL draft to go 'fully virtual' with concerns about tech issues and preparation - Fox News
description: The NFL will be the most online it’s ever been when the draft takes place toward the end of this month.
content:
The NFL will be the most online it’s ever been when the draft takes place toward the end of this month.
The NFL draft between April 23 and April 25 will be “fully virtual,” with prospects, coaches, general managers and executives stuck at home to make their … [+4669 chars]
